ygData.subject: Re: Bard vs Wizard race?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think I have around 40 odd with items and chant takes me up well over 100. Diving in and swimming to shore caused me to lose about one bubble of health
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Oct 04/99, kim@... wrote:
> From: <kim@...>

> > With a running leap out of there you can get a great jump into the lava
> > pool. We got some great screenshots. The dwarf is especially funny
> > because when they do a running jump their animation makes them do a
> > summersault. With my slightly pumped up fire resist (BI Crown, Fork)
> > I was taking maybe 22 hp damage and if I sang chant of cooling I took
> > about 16.
>
> I took 44 points/sec with 25 fire resist. Playing Elemental
> Rhythms raised that to 71 resist, and I took 26 points/sec.
> Dunno if level or AC plays a part.

I think I have around 40 odd with items and chant takes me up well over
100. Diving in and swimming to shore caused me to lose about one bubble
of health (1143 is what I have I think).

That said I'm still glad the time I lost my corpse to a fire giant
summoning me that the GM considered it a bug and summoned my corpse to
the zone. He said it was under a ledge somewhere in the lava where I
never would have got it out.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
